content:
this is a single endpoint from an open api spec document
it has been minified by removing unnecessary kvps
additionally common terms have been abbreviated  operationId: GetSite path: https://gateway.stackpath.com/delivery/v1/stacks/{stack_id}/sites/{site_id} content: params
name stackid
desc a stack id or slug
in path
required true
schema
type str
name siteid
desc a site id
in path
required true
schema
type str
sum get a site
responses
200
deliverygetsiteresponse
type obj
deliverysite
type obj
props
id
type str
desc a sites unique identifier
stackid
type str
desc the id of the stack to which a site belongs
label
type str
desc the sites name
status
type str
desc the sites status
features
type arr
deliverysitefeature
type str
default unknown
desc a site feature

a sites feature determines how stackpath delivers content to incoming https requests

  unknown stackpath is unable to determine a sites feature
  cdn a site has cdn caching
  waf a site has waf protection
  api a site has apispecific protections
  serverlessedgeengine a site can serve edgeengine serverless scripts
desc a sites features

site features control how its content is delivered to end users
createdat
type str
format datetime
desc the date a site was created
updatedat
type str
format datetime
desc the date a site was last updated
apiurls
type str
desc a list of api urls which receive different processing through the waf than website requests
monitoring
type bool
format bool
desc whether or not a sites waf service is in a monitor state

sites in waf monitoring mode accept incoming requests and log but take no action on policy and rule violations
desc the response from a request to retrieve a single site
title: 27_Sites_GetSite_161.json
